X-JSON-RPC-URL.name: X-JSON-RPC-URL
X-JSON-RPC-URL.description: Override default JSON RPC URL used for querying the blockchain

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: Groups all endpoints related to account information, such as retrieving account balances, nonces, and other account address-specific data.

tags.name: Blocks
tags.description: Encompasses all endpoints related to querying block information on the Koinos blockchain.

tags.name: Chain
tags.description: Groups endpoints that provide information about the blockchain's current state, such as chain ID, block head info, fork heads, and resource limits.

tags.name: Contracts
tags.description: Includes endpoints for interacting with smart contracts deployed on the Koinos blockchain, covering contract ABI, reading the contract state, etc.

tags.name: Decode
tags.description: Endpoints under the 'Decode' tag are used for decoding encoded blockchain data, such as operations and event logs, making them human-readable and easier to interpret.

tags.name: Fungible Tokens
tags.description: Groups endpoints that deal with fungible token operations, including querying token balances, total supply, general information, etc.

tags.name: Non Fungible Tokens
tags.description: Encompasses all endpoints related to Non Fungible Tokens on the Koinos blockchain, including querying an account's NFT balance, total supply, NFT's uri, etc.

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description: Groups endpoints handling transaction related operations, including querying transaction details, preparing a transaction, and submitting it.

get.description: Retrieves the balance of a specific fungible token for a given account. The balance is determined by the contract address of the token. The example demonstrates how to query the balance of the token with contract ID 15DJN4a8SgrbGhhGksSBASiSYjGnMU8dGL for the account with address 1NsQbH5AhQXgtSNg1ejpFqTi2hmCWz1eQS.
get.summary: Retrieves the balance of a specific fungible token for a given account.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: 15DJN4a8SgrbGhhGksSBASiSYjGnMU8dGL is the contract address of the fungible token.  Alternatively, the name of the contract, KOIN, can also be used. Its KAP names can also be used, however, this contract address does not have any registered yet.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: 1NsQbH5AhQXgtSNg1ejpFqTi2hmCWz1eQS is the account address of the fungible token.  Alternatively, the nickname of the address, burnkoin, can also be used. Its KAP names can also be used, however, this contract address does not have any registered yet.

get.description: Returns the transaction history by inputting either a their Koinos address, a system contract name, or a KAP name. Feel free to test the placeholder values and the respective response below before testing out your own data.
get.summary: Fetches the transaction history for a specific account.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: 1NsQbH5AhQXgtSNg1ejpFqTi2hmCWz1eQS is the account address of the fungible token.  Alternatively, the nickname of the address, burnkoin, can also be used. Its KAP names can also be used, however, this contract address does not have any registered yet. The same logic applies to contract addresses such as 15DJN4a8SgrbGhhGksSBASiSYjGnMU8dGL.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of records to be returned

parameters.name: sequence_number
parameters.description: Sequence number offset

parameters.name: ascending
parameters.description: Arrange records in ascending or descending order.

parameters.name: irreversible
parameters.description: Choose if irreversible history records should be returned or not.

parameters.name: decode_operations
parameters.description: Whether or not the operations should be decoded

parameters.name: decode_events
parameters.description: Whether or not the events should be decoded

get.description: Return the account's available mana.
get.summary: Obtains the current mana balance for a specified account.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: 1NsQbH5AhQXgtSNg1ejpFqTi2hmCWz1eQS is the account address of the fungible token.  Alternatively, the nickname of the address, burnkoin, can also be used. Its KAP names can also be used, however, this contract address does not have any registered yet.

get.description: Returns the account's next nonce
get.summary: Retrieves the next nonce for a given account.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The account address to query

parameters.name: decode_nonce
parameters.description: Whether or not the nonce should be decoded

get.description: Returns the account's nonce
get.summary: Fetches the current nonce of a specified account.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The account address to query

parameters.name: decode_nonce
parameters.description: Whether or not the nonce should be decoded

get.description: Input a block id or number. Return data about that block and its receipt.
get.summary: Return data about that block and its receipt.

parameters.name: block_id
parameters.description: The block id or number

parameters.name: return_block
parameters.description: Whether or not the block content should be returned

parameters.name: return_receipt
parameters.description: Whether or not the receipts content should be returned

parameters.name: decode_operations
parameters.description: Whether or not the operations should be decoded

parameters.name: decode_events
parameters.description: Whether or not the events should be decoded

get.description: Returns the chain's fork heads
get.summary: Retrieves the current fork heads of the Koinos blockchain, indicating any divergences in the chain.

get.description: Returns the chain's head info
get.summary: Provides information about the current head of the blockchain, including its height and id.

get.description: Returns the chain id
get.summary: Fetches the unique identifier of the blockchain, commonly known as the chain ID.

get.description: Returns the chain's resource limits
get.summary: Obtains information about the resource limits and usage for the blockchain, such as computational power and network bandwidth.

get.description: Read the contract contract using the method and arguments provided
get.summary: Executes a specified 'read' method on the given contract and returns the result, without making any state changes.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Koinos address of the contract, name of the contract (for system contracts) or KAP name

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Method of the contract to call

post.description: Read the contract using the method and arguments provided

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Koinos address of the contract, name of the contract (for system contracts) or KAP name

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Method of the contract to call

get.description: Returns the contract's ABI
get.summary: Retrieves the ABI (Application Binary Interface) of the specified contract, detailing its methods and protobuf definitions.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Koinos address of the contract, name of the contract (for system contracts) or KAP name

post.description: This endpoint takes an array of "encoded" events and returns an array of "decoded" events. Feel free to test the example request body and response below before testing out your own data.
post.summary: Decodes a series of blockchain events, translating them from encoded formats into human-readable forms.

requestBody.description: Input is expected to be an array of "encoded" events.

post.description: This endpoint takes an array of 'encoded' operations and returns an array of 'decoded' operations. Feel free to test the example request body and response below before testing out your own data.
post.summary: Decodes and interprets blockchain operations, providing details in a format that is easily understandable.

requestBody.description: Input is expected to be an array of 'encoded' operations.

get.description: Returns the non fungible token's account balance.
get.summary: Retrieves the balance of Non Fungible Tokens under a specific contract address for a given account address.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: The Koinos address of the NFT contract.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The Koinos address of the account to query.

get.description: Returns information about the non fungible token, such as its name, symbol, total supply, and URI.
get.summary: Provides comprehensive information about a specific Non Fungible Token contract, including such as its name, symbol, total supply, and URI.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: The Koinos address of the NFT contract.

200.description: Information about the Non Fungible Token

get.description: Returns the name of the non fungible token.
get.summary: Fetches the name of a specific Non Fungible Token as defined in the contract.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: The Koinos address of the NFT contract.

200.description: Name of the Non Fungible Token

get.description: Returns the symbol of the non fungible token.
get.summary: Retrieves the symbol associated with a specific Non Fungible Token contract.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: The Koinos address of the NFT contract.

200.description: Symbol of the Non Fungible Token

get.description: Returns the total supply of the non fungible token.
get.summary: Retrieves the total supply of Non Fungible Tokens issued under a specific contract.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: The Koinos address of the NFT contract.

200.description: Total Supply of the Non Fungible Token

get.description: Returns the URI associated with the non fungible token contract.
get.summary: Obtains the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for a Non Fungible Token contract, typically pointing to metadata.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: The Koinos address of the NFT contract.

200.description: URI of the Non Fungible Token

get.description: Returns the fungible token balance for a specific account
get.summary: Retrieves the balance of a specific fungible token for a given account.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Koinos address of the contract, name of the contract (for system contracts) or KAP name

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: Koinos address of the account, name of the account (for system contracts) or KAP name

get.summary: Fetches the decimal precision used by a specific fungible token.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Koinos address of the contract, name of the contract (for system contracts) or KAP name

get.description: Returns the fungible token's information such as name, symbol, decimals, and total supply
get.summary: Provides comprehensive information about a specific fungible token, including name, symbol, and total supply.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Koinos address of the contract, name of the contract (for system contracts) or KAP name

get.description: Returns the name of the fungible token
get.summary: Retrieves the name of a specific fungible token.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Koinos address of the contract, name of the contract (for system contracts) or KAP name

get.description: Returns the symbol of the fungible token
get.summary: Fetches the symbol of a specific fungible token.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Koinos address of the contract, name of the contract (for system contracts) or KAP name

get.description: Returns the total supply of the fungible token
get.summary: Retrieves the total supply of a specific fungible token.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Koinos address of the contract, name of the contract (for system contracts) or KAP name

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific transaction.
get.summary: Retrieves detailed information about a specific transaction by its ID.

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the transaction

parameters.name: return_receipt
parameters.description: Specifies whether the transaction receipt should be included in the response

parameters.name: decode_operations
parameters.description: Specifies whether the operations within the transaction should be decoded

parameters.name: decode_events
parameters.description: Specifies whether the events within the transaction should be decoded

post.description: This endpoint takes a transaction and an optional provider and/or payer, then returns a prepared transaction object.
This endpoint takes a transaction and submits it to the JSON RPC node.
post.summary: Submits a prepared transaction to the blockchain network for processing.

parameters.name: broadcast
parameters.description: Sets whether this transaction is broadcasted globally or not. Defaults to true.
